message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living! I can do $100, that's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate that Alice.  I'd be happy to meet you halfway at $95.
I can see you're serious about getting this product! I'm willing to meet you at $98, but that's as low as I can go.
